bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. identical with you yu 憂鬱 , grief with pent-up [qi]. Nan jing 難經 49: 憂愁思慮 則傷心，形寒飲冷則傷肺 , “ Worrying and pondering harm the heart. A cold body and chilled beverages harm the lung”.

② Illness Sign of depression brought forth by frequent worrying and much grief. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 14: 治心氣不定，五臟不足，甚者憂愁，悲傷不樂，忽忽善忘，朝瘥暮劇 , “To cure unstable heart qi, and if the [qi of the] five depots is insufficient. In extreme cases with depression and sadness and sorrow, and a recurring tendency to be forgetful. In the morning this improves; at night it is serious”.
